page.title: 11LAW&ORDER WOLSTANTON.
page.content: Wolstanton police station closed in 1965 because Newcastle station was bigger,and they decideed to run operatioom there.Policing is done by area constables,and by car patrols. Northern patrol officers do the traffic duties.The police stations 118 men and women include 2 dog handlers,and 18 C.I.D.officers.Sometimes police officers come into school to talk to us about road safety or not talking to strangers.Next term they are going to come in and show us how the police work.There will be a police-car and radios and uniforms to try on.They are going to take our fingerprints,but we will be able to take them home afterwards.Apoliceman also comes into school every year to test the children who have been doing cycling proficiency.
